review: I have Fire TV hooked up at my office, and love that I can move things between my Kindle Fire, Fire TV and laptop.  The talk to search capability is pretty good, and the system is incredibly easy to set up and use.  May be a bit of overkill when you have Prime, a Fire HD, and a iPad, but I love my Amazon ecosystem.
author: Edward J. Barton
